text: Pogonocherus mixtus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Haldeman in 1847. It is known from Canada and the United States.BioLib.cz - Pogonocherus mixtus. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Pogonocherini Category:Beetles described in 1847
title: Pogonocherus mixtus
